creditline: Gift of Roberta and Richard Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: 2 panel huipil; ground isvertical stripes of varying width in lavendar, red, natural, yellow. Supplementary weft patterning in silk and cotton across the width of the upper half in pale yellow, white, light gray, blue, purple, design includes birds and dec. patterning.
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
